definition: future (career etc) prospects
front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly
rule/order/regulations/formula/journey/procedure/sequence
surname Cheng
bright future/bright prospects
each goes his own way (idiom); each person has his own life to lead
to have a future full of promise

sentences.english: And getting into a top tier university is the best way to ensure a good future.
sentences.chinese: 而進入一流大學則是確保錦繡前程的最好方法。

sentences.english: Chu Bong Foo is concerned about the future of Chinese culture.
sentences.chinese: 遙眺未來，中國文化的前程是朱邦復最關心的事。

sentences.english: When their future is confronted with love, which one is more important?
sentences.chinese: 當前程與愛情一同遭遇未來，該怎樣棄取？

sentences.english: Finally, I wish you all good luck and success in your career.
sentences.chinese: 在此，我謹祝各位日後工作順利，前程錦繡。

sentences.english: "Peng" symbolizes the fly, for the future.
sentences.chinese: “鵬”象徵着展翅高飛，前程似錦。

sentences.english: Awesome they have great careers ahead of them, but are they truly happy?
sentences.chinese: 有個似錦的前程固然好，但是他們真的就開心了麼？

sentences.english: Sixty years of fruitful construction process, the future of the new century entrepreneurial road fairview.
sentences.chinese: 六十年建設歷程碩果累累，新世紀創業道路前程錦繡。

sentences.english: The final Zhu Gui company has a bright future , wishes that your cause is ever more flourishing.
sentences.chinese: 最後祝貴公司前程似錦，祝您的事業蒸蒸日上。

sentences.english: Unlike are we, unlike, o princely heart!
sentences.chinese: 原不一樣是我們的職司和前程。

sentences.english: He predicted a brilliant future for the child.
sentences.chinese: 他曾預言這孩子前程似錦。

sentences.english: Excuse me, but would you perhaps be Mr. Kay of Great Expectations Company?
sentences.chinese: 對不起，請問您是遠大前程公司的凱女士嗎？

sentences.english: Now I can see that we've fallen apart.
sentences.chinese: 當初我明白我們未經各奔前程。

sentences.english: She staked her political career on tax reform, and lost.
sentences.chinese: 她把自己的政治前程押在稅制改革上，結果賭輸了。

sentences.english: Please accept my sincere wishes for the New Year and may your happy future be a most successful one.
sentences.chinese: 請接受我最誠摯的新年祝福，祝願您前程似錦。

sentences.english: Polley’s promising career has achieved another milestone.
sentences.chinese: 這是波莉在前程遠大的事業中取得的又一個里程碑。

sentences.english: They predicted the youth would have a bright future.
sentences.chinese: 他們預言這位年輕人前程似錦。
